titleStmt.title: The Dukes mistris as it vvas presented by her Majesties Servants, at the private house in Drury-Lane. Written by Iames Shirly.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Norton, for Andrevv Crooke, and William Cooke,

notesStmt.note: One of three imprint variants of this edition; this is probably the first (see "The Library" 10 (Dec. 1988), p. 317-38).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
